Function Documentation

function it_recon ( in  varargin  ) 

it_recon performs general scheme of iterative reconstruction.

Function is overload.

Parameters:
First:varargin{1} disp_mode 'display' or 'no_display' during reconstruction
Second:varargin{1} algorithm params (struct), struct properties are:
Second:varargin{1}:struct:method iterative algorithm method (equation for one step)
Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'LBP' linearized backprojection
Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'Landweber' gradient steepest descent with small step (default)
Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'LandweberNormalized' Landweber for normalized data
Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'NewtonRaphson' nonlinear Gauss-Newton with regularization
Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'NewtonRaphsonConstrained' nonlinear Gauss-Newton with regularization and a constrain
Second:varargin{1}:struct:method:name 'LM' nonlinear Gauss-Newton with Marquardt regularization
Second:varargin{1}:struct:numiter stop after 'numiter' iterations
Second:varargin{1}:struct:stop_delta stop when image changes are lower than 'stop_delta'
Second:varargin{1}:struct:update_method 'modulo' or 'auto' method of selecting moment for sensitivity matrix update
Second:varargin{1}:struct:iter_mod update sensitivity matrix modulo 'iter_mod' iteration
Second:varargin{1}:struct:update_delta update sensitivity where dC becomes lower than 'update_delta'
Second:varargin{1}:struct:alpha relaxation factor (step length)
Second:varargin{1}:struct:alphalimit limitation of relaxation factor: 'adapt or 'noadapt'
Second:varargin{1}:struct:regular 'manual', 'l_curve' or 'GCV' selection of regularization parameter u
Second:varargin{1}:struct:u Thikonov regularization factor for matrix pseudo inverse
Second:varargin{2} disp_mode 'display' or 'no_display' during reconstruction
Return values:
Ep new better estimation of permittivity
